message:
New size units:
Originally the index only returned human readable sizes
(e.g. 1.2MiB) for the size of files.
This was good for users, but not for comparing sizes
of files accurately.
Now the index has been updated to show the size of files
in a human readable format but also has a size in bytes
that is not displayed in search results.
Update to the latest version of ishare2 to see
the file sizes in the right format!
